mapper.select: SELECT g.name AS name, SUM(gd.num) AS value from goods as g INNER JOIN goods_order as gd ON gd.goods_id = g.goods_id GROUP BY gd.goods_id ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT ma.card_type AS name, count(ma.apply_id) AS value from member_apply as ma GROUP BY ma.card_type,ma.card_day ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 7
SELECT c.course_name AS name, count(mc.member_course_id) AS value FROM course as c LEFT JOIN member_course as mc ON c.course_id = mc.course_id GROUP BY c.course_id
